translations: 重新部署，调遣（士兵），调配（工人、设备）（redeploy 的过去式）

sentences.sentence: Our troops are to be redeployed elsewhere.
sentences.translation: 我们的部队将被重新部署到其他地区。

sentences.sentence: Some of the workers there will be redeployed to other sites.
sentences.translation: 那里的一些工人们将被调配到其它工地。

sentences.sentence: Most of the employees will be redeployed to other parts of the company.
sentences.translation: 大多数雇员将被调配到公司的其他部门。
